title: Ep 312 | Phil Robertson Has Some Specific Instructions for When He Dies
description:
Phil reveals how he wants his family to handle his death and the unusual things he wants them to do with his body. Jase talks about Missy being questioned in Colorado because she was with a person who looked a certain way. Phil shares Miss Kay's opinion on Botox after the incident with Bobo. Al defines "university" and explains how it's mostly untrue in today’s culture. Jase discusses the way Scripture can bring people together as a cure for the hate in the world, and Phil thinks people are bored when they're not hating others.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
